#summary menuitem widget reference

= menuitem widget =
A [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html GtkMenuItem] or [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImageMenuItem.html GtkImageMenuItem]
----

== Definition ==
{{{
<menuitem tag_attr="value"...>
	<variable>varname</variable>
	<visible>state</visible>
	<action>activity</action>...
	<action signal="type">activity</action>...
	<action type="function">parameter</action>...
</menuitem>
}}}
"..." denotes acceptance of multiples of the same thing.

== Tag Attributes ==
See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html#GtkMenuItem.object-hierarchy GtkMenuItem] widget or [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImageMenuItem.html#GtkImageMenuItem.object-hierarchy GtkImageMenuItem] widget and ancestor class properties.

The following custom tag attributes are available:
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Value* || *Since* ||
|| accel-key || Accelerator key || A decimal or hexadecimal value [http://git.gnome.org/browse/gtk+/plain/gdk/gdkkeysyms.h (full list)] || 0.7.21 ||
|| accel-mods || Accelerator modifiers || A decimal or hexadecimal value [http://git.gnome.org/browse/gtk+/plain/gdk/gdktypes.h (full list)]^[1]^ || 0.7.21 ||
|| icon || GTK theme image name ||  || ||
|| stock || Stock GTK image name || {{{gtk-about}}}, {{{gtk-add}}}, ... [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/gtk-Stock-Items.html#GTK-STOCK-ABOUT:CAPS (full list)] || ||

== Directives ==
Some of these may have tag attribute equivalents.
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Contents* || *Mandatory* || *Since* ||
|| variable || Shell variable name || || || ||
|| visible || Sensitive state || {{{enabled}}} or {{{disabled}}} || || 0.7.21 ||
|| action || Execute command on default signal || Shell command || || ||
|| action || Perform function on default signal || _function_:_parameter_ || || ||
|| action signal="_type_" || Execute command on signal || Shell command || || ||
|| action signal="_type_" || Perform function on signal || _function_:_parameter_ || || ||
|| action type="_function_" || Perform function on default signal || _parameter_ || || ||

== Signals ==
See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html#GtkMenuItem.signals GtkMenuItem] widget or [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImageMenuItem.html#GtkImageMenuItem.signals GtkImageMenuItem] widget signals.

The default signal is "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html#GtkMenuItem-activate activate]", emitted when the item is activated.

== Functions ==
The following functions can be performed upon this widget by any widget capable of emitting signals:
|| *Type* || *Description* || *Parameter* || *Since* ||
|| enable || Sensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||
|| disable || Desensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||

The following general functions can be performed by any widget capable of emitting signals:
|| *Type* || *Description* || *Parameter* || *Since* ||
|| command || Execute command || Shell command || ||
|| exit || Exit dialog || A value for the {{{EXIT}}} shell variable || ||
|| closewindow || Close launched dialog || Launched dialog's shell variable name || ||
|| launch || Launch new dialog || New dialog's shell variable name || ||

== Notes ==
1. SHIFT is 1, CTRL is 4 and ALT is 8 and you can OR them together.
